mapper.select: select PI.ID_ as processInstanceId, PD.NAME_ as processName, PI.PROC_DEF_ID_ as processDefinitionId, PI.START_TIME_ as startTime, INC.INCIDENT_STATE_ as incState, DP.name_ as component, pi.end_time_ as runState, TA.name_ as activity, TA.assignee_ as assignee from act_hi_procinst PI inner join act_re_procdef PD on PI.proc_def_id_ = pd.id_ inner join act_re_deployment DP on DP.id_ = pd.deployment_id_ left outer join act_hi_incident INC on INC.proc_inst_id_ = pi.id_ inner join act_hi_taskinst TA on TA.proc_inst_id_ = pi.id_ and ta.end_time_ is null inner join act_hi_varinst VAR on PI.id_ = VAR.proc_inst_id_ where (var.name_ = 'SCHUTZTITELNUMMER' and var.double_ = #{parameter.titleNumber}) or (var.name_ = 'GESUCHSNUMMER' and var.double_ = #{parameter.requestNumber})
